Author: xcitrus9
Text: I believe that my ED is partly caused because of his actions towards the end of the relationship and it sucks honestly. I miss him so much and he hates me :(

Author: Dalos_
Text: Screw him. You’re sick and you do not need his validation because you are your own, whole, amazing person. I’m really sorry things have been so tough on you but I know things will get better- you’ll find someone who cares about you.
